LEGAL

Disclaimer

The Foundation for Promotion of Sports and Games (“FPSG”) shall Endeavour to put up only such information on the site, www.olympicgoldquest.in, as being true to the best of their knowledge and belief. However, the FPSG does not accept any liability due to inaccuracy of information or data provided on this site. Any liabilities arising out of any act or omission by a visitor to this site, by relying on or using the information provided on this site shall be solely to the account of such visitor. The FPSG will strive to ensure that the tax exemption certificates and feedback reports to the donors are sent within reasonable time limits.

The FPSG disclaims any liability, legal or otherwise, that may arise due to the act, omission or otherwise of any visitor to this site, or caused by the same. Visitors also acknowledge that visiting this site is an implicit acceptance of this disclaimer on their part.

Terms of Use

Your use of the www.olympicgoldquest.in web site (the “Site”) is governed by the policies, terms, and conditions set forth below. Please read the following information carefully. By using this Site or donating through the site, you indicate your acceptance of, and agreement to be bound by, the terms set forth below. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, please do not use this Site.

Your continued usage of the site shall be in acceptance to the terms that may be updated in future with retrospective effect. Incase you do not agree to any terms your sole remedy is to stop using the website.

These terms and conditions may be changed by the Foundation for Promotion of Sports and Games (“FPSG”), in the future. It is your responsibility as a user to periodically return to this page to review the terms and conditions for amendments. The amended terms shall take effect automatically the day they are posted on the site. Your continued use of the web site following any amendments will constitute agreement to such amendments. These Terms of Service were last revised on 12th June, 2009.

The information contained in this website has been prepared solely for the purpose of providing information about activities of the Foundation of Promotion of Sports and Games and its associated members, only to interested persons and associations, and is not in any way binding on this website. All content included on this site, such as text, logo, photographs and the compilation of this content are the property of the FPSG, or its content suppliers. Due to unavailability of certain photographs there may be certain pictures, which are not the property of the FPSG. In case any pictures that are not a property of FPSG, and is violating any of your copyrights, then please let us know at the earliest. We shall take the necessary steps once confirmed that it is not our property. Any other use, including the reproduction, modification, distribution, transmission, republication, display or performance, of the content on this site is strictly prohibited. By accessing this website, you agree that the website will not be liable for any direct or indirect loss arising from the use of the information and the material contained in this Web Site. However, information is as available with this website is absolutely intended to serve as an introduction only and the visitors are requested to verify the information before they act upon it by calling / contacting the concerned.

For your easy accessibility this website may include links to site(s) on the Internet that are owned or operated by third parties. By linking to such third-party site(s), you shall review and agree to that site’s rules of use before using such site(s). You also agree that this website has no control over the content of that site and cannot assume any responsibility for material created or published by such third-party site(s). In addition, a link to any other site does not imply that this site endorses that particular site or the products or services referenced in such third party site(s).

Privacy Policy

User information on this site, www.olympicgoldquest.in, is kept strictly confidential. The site may, however, use this information from time to time for purposes such as corresponding with the users for various issues. We shall duly seek permission of the users in such cases.

Like many web servers, our server records the IP address of each visitor to our site. It records the domain of the website you last visited prior to India Partners–the “referring website.” It identifies the specific pages on our website that you visit as well as the day and time of your visit.

We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy policy without advance notice. If you have any questions regarding this policy, email us. This policy was last updated on 9th June, 2009.

Online Donations

If you wish to donate / pay through this site, www.olympicgoldquest.in, you will be asked to supply certain information. We do not accept anonymous donation / payments. You agree that all information that you provide to the Foundation for Promotion of Sports and Games (“FPSG”) will be accurate, complete and current. Once you donate / pay, you agree to fully complete and fulfill the Obligations that arise out of your participation in donation / payments on the Site. You agree to pay all charges incurred by authorized users of your account and credit card or other payment mechanism at the prices in effect when such charges are incurred, to the FPSG, through it’s Bankers / Credit Card Companies. You will also be responsible for paying any applicable taxes, if any. The FPSG currently accepts donations through its ICICI Bank Online Payment Gateway Facility.

Please note donations / payments once made cannot be charged back, except in cases of fraudulent use, once investigation is carried out by necessary governmental / Bank authorities and proofs substantiated. Incase any donation receipt is issued against the same, that shall stand cancelled, and any income tax benefit so derived shall be null and void.Please Note: All donations / payments made through the site, the acceptance of the same is at the sole discretion of the FPSG management and its Board of Directors. The management reserves its sole rights to accept or reject any donation / payment without assigning any reason thereof, with full money being refunded to the applicant.

Tax Benefits

While giving is best done as an act of pure human love, we appreciate that tax benefits will help you stretch your contributions even further. Contributions to the Foundation for Promotion of Sports and Games are eligible for the following tax benefits:

For Indian Tax Payers: u/s 80G of the IT Act up to 50% of your donation is deductible.

Litigation

Any dispute arising out of use of this website, www.olympicgoldquest.in shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Republic of India and the courts of Mumbai shall have exclusive jurisdiction in respect to any such a dispute.

About us

OGQ is a program of the Foundation for Promotion of Sports and Games, a Not for Profit (Section 8) Company founded by Indian sports legends Geet Sethi and Prakash Padukone.
The mission of OGQ is to support Indian athletes in winning Olympic and Paralympic Gold medals.
